http://play2.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=editor/10a5dd47-230f-4273-8027-771e853f4134%2fTea+for+Mistress.aslx

You are a little familiar who is on a mission to cure your witch of her cold!!

-----

This is my first Text Adventure Story!! So it is going to be very...VERY simple! It was originally made for a Text Adventure game jam over on itch.io.

If you enjoyed this game, let me know if you would like to see more text adventures from me.

You are a little familiar who is on a mission to cure your witch of her cold!!

This is my first Text Adventure Story!! So it is going to be very...VERY simple! It was originally made for a Text Adventure game jam over on itch.io.

If you enjoyed this game, let me know if you would like to see more text adventures from me.
